title: Yet Another Parable On The Importance Of Controlling Your Experiments
summary:
Key ideas
- The author tried a productivity hack beginning with "M" to increase focus
- The author started studying calligraphy for seven hours as a test of the hack's effectiveness
- The author counts the experiment as a success
- Later, the author spends five hours studying calligraphy again as a means of distraction

Key learnings
- The productivity hack may have contributed to an increased focus on calligraphy
- Calligraphy is a really interesting activity that can be engrossing

Key questions
- Is the productivity hack effective in increasing focus on tasks?
- How can the author balance productivity and personal interests?
